name: RMA Consulting
tagline: digital experience that are anything but everyday.
description:
RMA creates every day digital experiences that are anything but everyday. We conceive and deliver transformative solutions designed for longevity, that people actually want to use. Whether your user is an employee or consumer, our strategic, UX design and front-end technology consultants love to work on large-scale, complex, digital requirements to deliver functional tools with powerfully intuitive user experiences.
Based in London’s Shoreditch, RMA’s award-winning digital solutions have set new standards since 2005 for clients such as UBS, Morgan Stanley, NATO and the Met Office.
